data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đang đứng trên ban công của một khách sạn rất đẹp khi chúng tôi nhìn thấy nhau.
data.en_hint: He was standing on balcony of a beautiful hotel when our eyes met.
data.content_game_1: He was standing on balcony of a beautiful hotel when our eyes met.
data.answer_en_hint: He was standing on balcony of a beautiful hotel when our eyes met.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy xây một bức tường cao ở sân sau.
data.en_hint: He built a high brick wall in his backyard.
data.content_game_1: He built a high brick wall in his backyard.
data.answer_en_hint: He built a high brick wall in his backyard.

data.trans_hint: Không có nhiều nhà cao tầng ở Hải Phòng.

data.answer_en_hint: There aren't many tall buildings in Hai Phong.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy không ngủ được nên cứ nhìn chằm chằm vào trần nhà.
data.en_hint: He can't sleep so he keeps staring at the ceiling.
data.content_game_1: He can't sleep so he keeps staring at the ceiling.
data.answer_en_hint: He can't sleep so he keeps staring at the ceiling.

data.trans_hint: Đừng đi lên chỗ bê tông ướt kia.
data.content_game_1: Don't walk on wet concrete.
data.answer_en_hint: Don't walk on wet concrete.

data.trans_hint: Việc xây dựng tòa nhà này sẽ được bắt đầu vào năm 2022.
data.en_hint: The construction of the building will be started in 2022.
data.content_game_1: The construction of the building will be started in 2022.
data.answer_en_hint: The construction of the building will be started in 2022.

data.trans_hint: Mọi người ở nông thôn không còn sống ở nhà tranh nữa.
data.en_hint: People in the countryside no longer live in cottages.
data.content_game_1: People in the countryside no longer live in cottages.
data.answer_en_hint: People in the countryside no longer live in cottages.

data.trans_hint: Cậu đã nhìn thấy bản thiết kế cho trung tâm mua sắm mới chưa?
data.en_hint: Have you seen the designs for the new shopping centre?
data.content_game_1: Have you seen the designs for the new shopping centre?
data.answer_en_hint: Have you seen the designs for the new shopping centre?

data.trans_hint: Họ mua một số dụng cụ y tế mới cho phòng khám
data.en_hint: They bought some new medical devices for the clinic.

data.answer_en_hint: They bought some new medical devices for the clinic.

data.trans_hint: Thang máy bị hỏng nên tôi phải dùng thang bộ.
